channel.title: Red Blend on Decanted
channel.description: Recent content in Red Blend on Decanted

item.title: Creekbend Noir
item.description: I love this wine. It’s a personal favorite of my wife’s and mine. The grapes are grown about 10 miles from where we live at Creekbend Vinyard in Elletseville, Indiana. This is my go to bottle of to gift to friends and family that aren’t already wine drinkers due to how approachable and easy-drinking it is. Tasting Notes 52% Corot, 48% Marechal Foch grapes Dried Fruit, Cherry, Raisins Medium body High fruity and juicy acidity
